title: Failed transaction successfully recorded in a private blockchain
body:
[SimpleStorage_contract.txt](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/files/12762714/SimpleStorage_contract.txt)

I've deployed a smart contract for testing in a private blockchain running QBFT consensus and 4 Besu nodes. When I tried to transfer funds (just to see what would happen even though the contract hasn't a receive method) to the contract address via MetaMask, the transaction has failed as expected, but it was still  successfully recorded in the blockchain.

- Command to transaction details: 

 curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_geTransactionByHash","params":["0x6ee0ae237fd45b6f15d58696b5ca7a97923f126baa111603ba222af48d0e50ee"],"id":1}' http://40.75.121.249:8545

- Output:
{
  "jsonrpc" : "2.0",
  "id" : 1,
  "result" : {
    "blockHash" : "0x2251fc4e4d36637a32b1086aca77eac1883a8fb6dd26ce2ca2371f4af273ed47",
    "blockNumber" : "0x9de",
    "chainId" : "0x53a",
    "from" : "0xfe3b557e8fb62b89f4916b721be55ceb828dbd73",
    "gas" : "0x3d0900",
    "gasPrice" : "0x0",
    "hash" : "0x6ee0ae237fd45b6f15d58696b5ca7a97923f126baa111603ba222af48d0e50ee",
    "input" : "0x",
    "nonce" : "0x1",
    "to" : "0xf57f76d23568e31b12f62e7b8eb880f486369bcf",
    "transactionIndex" : "0x0",
    "type" : "0x0",
    "value" : "0x4563918244f40000",
    "v" : "0xa98",
    "r" : "0xb381790b151d2af177267c29514cd76ca55be8b7f59156b013df2ea59aa4310c",
    "s" : "0x16c350b25195a9b9b81f80edb185304ffa433deec968532dc898b8b1b172af95"
  }
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  

-   Command to get contract address balance: 

curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getBalance","params":["0xf57f76d23568e31b12f62e7b8eb880f486369bcf", "latest"],"id":53}' http://40.75.121.249:8545
